attributes.action: Close all schools to stop the spread of Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: This needs to be done so that the virus has less chance to spread between people.
attributes.background: The government is bringing in strict rules about who people can and can't mix with to help stop the spread. This is all well and good except when you have children mixing with people from multiple households. The government needs to close schools down to stop the spread

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that primary schools, secondary schools and colleges across England must move to remote provision from 5 January 2021, except for vulnerable children and the children of key workers.

You can read the Prime Minister's announcement of new Covid-19 restrictions, including school closures, here: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
